title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Why we don't criminalize former presidents. Column on special counsel on Obamagate. NFL quarterback doesn't want to get political, but wants to go back to work. Mask is symbol of fear, Democrat demand for masks is political -- if you don't wear one, you don't care. Rush has told you Twitter is a cesspool for years. Twitter makes miscalculation "fact-checking" Trump. Biden says mask is symbol of strength. The Trump-Scarborough feud. If Trump wanted to take Twitter down, he could, but he loves it. Where were the fact checks of all the Democrats who slandered Trump. Twitter uses CNN to post fact check of Trump tweet on mail-in ballot fraud. Plenty of evidence of mail-in ballot fraud. Trump uses conspiracy theories in clever way. He never says he believes in them, he just passes them on. Marco Rubio: by fact-checking Trump, Twitter is turning themselves into a publisher. Yoel Roth, pajama boy in charge of fact-checking Trump on Twitter, posted all kinds of vile hatred of Trump, Republicans and flyover states.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Why Rush can't stand Twitter. Bond between Rush and audience. Rush 24/7 hits new membership high. Dr. Fauci: Second wave not inevitable. Trump's Transition to Greatness recovery plan. Democrat governors willing to drop neutron bombs on their states to bring down national economy, Trump. Rubio: Fact checks make Twitter a publisher, takes away their immunity from liability. Cuomo holds national economy hostage for blue state bailout. Tiny percentage of general population uses Twitter. HBO Max debuts. The Blacklist animates season finale to make up for scenes not shot because of lockdown. The coup conspirators must be punished.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Ralph Northam mandates face coverings in Virginia. Frank Miele column calling for Obamagate special prosecutor. Rush thinks Andrew McCarthy should be special counsel for Obamagate. Most of general population doesn't use twitter. President of El Salvador says he's using hydroxychloroquine, most world leaders are. Researcher says COVID-19 is engineered. SpaceX launch. Movie theater owner told he's non-essential. Government agencies always fail us, 9/11, Iraq WMD.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
